values: Will Christ Be Humiliated on the Last Day? To the Class of 2025Will Christ Be Humiliated on the Last Day? To the Class of 2025

When Jesus returns in glory, he will stand ashamed of those who were ashamed of him here. But what will it really mean for Jesus to be ashamed?When Jesus returns in glory, he will stand ashamed of those who were ashamed of him here. But what will it really mean for Jesus to be ashamed?
